bibl.title: Before the Penthemeros: Government Funds for the Canal.
bibl.note: Sworn agreement by the elders of the village of Korphotoi to undertake the cleaning and repair of the three public canals which lie near the village. In a second document the same men certify the receipt of 120 drachmas from Heraklios the toparch. July 29, 25 B.C.
bibl.seg: Brashear William, Before the Penthemeros: Government Funds for the Canal.

Sworn agreement by the elders of the village of Korphotoi to undertake the cleaning and repair of the three public canals which lie near the village. In a second document the same men certify the receipt of 120 drachmas from Heraklios the toparch. July 29, 25 B.C.
